programme.title: Suster El Ep24
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Water Games Ep4
programme.desc: Sekumpulan peserta bertanding dalam pelbagai cabaran dalam satu permainan air, dengan impian memenangi hadiah utama.

programme.title: Menerima Tukar Tambah Ayang
programme.desc: Ayah Dini mengatur satu sandiwara di mana Gito dan Dini menukar tempat, dengan Gito menjadi anak orang kaya dan Dini menjadi anak orang miskin. Namun, semua itu tidak menghilangkan cinta antara Dini dan Gito.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep156
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep84
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep25
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Andien tersalah sangka bahawa Raffa, penjual lemper, adalah lelaki yang akan dinikahinya. Ini membawa kepada Andien jatuh cinta pada Raffa secara tidak sengaja. Walau bagaimanapun, di sebalik itu semua, terdapat misteri mengenai hubungan masa lalu antara Andien, Raffa, dan Benny, lelaki yang diatur untuk berkahwin dengan Andien.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep22
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Yang Mochi Mochi Aja
programme.desc: Wah, dari menjual mochi hingga jatuh hati. Itulah kisah romantis Arya dan Elis yang berkeliling menjual mochi hingga akhirnya mochi Elis menjadi sukses dan dikenali ramai.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officer’s soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class…

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Eungyo
programme.desc: Renowned old poet Jeokyo 's relationship with his son-like student Jiwoo starts to crack when a 17-year-old girl Eungyo steps in.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped…

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Okay! Madam

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep4344
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep104
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1045
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3380
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46584659
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep6162
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1829
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2060
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M)(repeat) Ep11
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her father’s MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lan’s MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the club’s and her honour.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei’s dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child’s unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian’s daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond…

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Mei’s dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the child’s unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom To Be
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng and Chrissie Chau reunite in this romantic-comedy about three heartbroken men who each purchase an iGirl, the latest smart-robot, as their new girlfriends.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protégé Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh’s epic “The Water Margin”, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-Killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.desc: Tamil Dance Movie, Starring, Prabhu Deva, Ragava Lawrence & Others

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Aurora

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 26
programme.desc: While remodeling a home, Michael uncovers an explosive way to paint and silences a co-worker with a traveling squeak. Later, Michael takes scrapbooking to blinding speed, and a hospital becomes the scene of a mind-bending game of cops and robbers!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 01
programme.desc: Michael breezes into the Windy City to shock and amaze the Chicago locals. In a health store, he sells a supplement that proves you are what you drink, and at a Metro station, he utterly derails a commuter's sense of reality.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors – a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) – he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles S1 5
programme.desc: An aristocratic Boston family member is found dead. Maura's ties to the family and Jane's resentment over their wealth threaten the investigation. MARK-PAUL GOSSELAAR guest stars.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 1
programme.desc: Former boxer Brandon Bernier and his wife Lori target the best storage units in America and then to go to any lengths to get their hands on what's stashed inside.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 2
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go to war over a record producer's storage unit and unearth what could be a priceless piece of rock and roll history. Then, Jesse one ups the competition for a locker with a multi-thousand dollar payout. And later, a booby-trapped unit explodes, sending shockwaves through the storage facility.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 4
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe fishing poles, bear traps and camping gear is the score of a lifetime. And later, fireworks explode when a locker full of liquor and rare Mardi Gras masks spark a do or die bidding war.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 7
programme.desc: After her latest mission unearths some startling information about Xiao, Nicky and the team devise a plan to deal with her once and for all.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 23
programme.desc: When the girls' trip to Vegas falls through, the guys invite them to a Dungeons & Dragons date night.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 24
programme.desc: On the sixth season finale, Sheldon and Penny are thrown for a loop when Leonard is offered an exciting new job opportunity overseas.

programme.title: The Hangover Part Ii
programme.desc: Ready for another round? In the follow-up to the record-breaking hit comedy, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms), Alan (Zach Galifianakis) and Doug (Justin Bartha) travel to exotic Thailand for Stu's wedding. After Doug's now-unforgettable Las Vegas bachelor party, Stu is not taking any chances and has opted for a safe and subdued pre-wedding brunch. Things don't always go as planned however. What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in Bangkok can't even be imagined – think monkeys, tattoos and the return of Mr. Chow! Acclaimed comedy filmmaker Todd Phillips reunites with his comic quartet of over-indulged stars for another globe-trotting howl at the moon with the "Wolfpack."

programme.title: The Hangover Part Iii
programme.desc: It's been two years since the guys prowled the seamy side of Las Vegas in a roofie haze and recovered from being kidnapped, shot at and chased by drug-dealing mobsters in Bangkok. Phil, Stu and Doug are happily living uneventful lives at home. The only member of the Wolfpack who's not content is Alan. Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way – which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment – until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. And who better than his three best friends to make sure he takes the first step. This time, there's no bachelor party. No wedding. What could possibly go wrong? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To Back In Time

programme.title: Orient Ep10
programme.desc: The Power Of The Goddess - Nanao is making fun of Musashi, Kojiro and Tsugumi with her Kyuubi Shichiseito which can split into 7 swords to attack.

programme.title: Orient Ep11
programme.desc: What's In A Katana - As time is limited, Musashi’s awaken Obsidian Goddess gathers the power of other swords to release the final attack!

programme.title: Orient Ep12
programme.desc: Where This Road Lead - Musashi, Kojiro and Tsugumi head east. Musashi meets Michiru who is going to join Uesugi Alliance’s battle in Harima.

programme.title: Orient S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Uesugi Bushi - Musashi, Kojiro, and Tsugumi arrive at Harima and meet a lot of bushi from all over the nation.

programme.title: Orient S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Humiliation On Board - Musashi is drafted into Uesugi Union and meets Akihiro, heir of Shimazu Bushi, and Katsumi, heir of Amako Bushi.

programme.title: High School Prodigies Have It Easy Even In Another World! Ep11
programme.desc: It Seems Keine Can’t Stand Naughty Boys! - An epidemic has spread amongst the commoners and Keine tries to cure the sick despite a Penicillin shortage.

programme.title: High School Prodigies Have It Easy Even In Another World! Ep12
programme.desc: It Seems High School Prodigies Have It Easy In Another World! - Jeanne and Shinobu realise that Tanganika is Gustave in disguise. They manage to escape when he burns down the castle.

programme.title: Infini-T Force Ep1
programme.desc: Isolated Flower - Emi Kaido witnesses her life change in an interdimensional flash when a band of otherworldly heroes rescues her from an ambush in Shibuya.

programme.title: Infini-T Force Ep2
programme.desc: Immediate Family - Emi reluctantly protects the heroes from danger. But the buoyant mood in the camp soon turns tense.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep85
programme.desc: Dark-Colored Rhapsody - The group is trapped inside the last tower on the Ark with two Noahs, where Lenalee and Lavi learn that Allen’s Innocence became part of his heart.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep86
programme.desc: The Weak Person - Tyki is determined to crush Allen’s Innocence once again. While fighting Tyki, Allen’s forearm transforms into a sword and Tyki is left shocked.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep87
programme.desc: Critical Point - After exceeding critical point, Allen’s power with his Innocence increased and he escaped successfully from Tyki’s vacuum.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man Ep88
programme.desc: Lavi - Back in the dream world, Lavi realizes that Allen in Road’s dream is the true Road, and finally damages her as a blade pierces her body.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep3
programme.desc: The Arcane Blacksmith Is Suspicious - Gallus appreciates Fran’s fighting skills and discovers Teacher is an intelligent weapon. Fran gets her first armour.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep4
programme.desc: A Goblin Stampede Is An Emergency - Teacher and Fran defeat over 100 goblins and return to Alessa. The Guild forms a team to kill goblin, Fran is chosen.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep5
programme.desc: A Perfect Dungeon Debut - With the support of Teacher, Fran collects the magic stones, conquers the dungeon successfully and has to face the boss.

programme.title: Reincarnated As A Sword Ep6
programme.desc: The Greater Demon Was A Cheater - Teacher advises Fran to retreat as they are chased by demons. But Fran doesn’t want to give up protecting Alessa.

programme.title: The Seven Deadly Sins Ep5
programme.desc: Even If You Were To Die - Just as his weapon is about to be taken away from him, Meliodas, who has been poisoned, retaliates through a mysterious power.

programme.title: The Seven Deadly Sins Ep6
programme.desc: Ballad Of The Beginning - Elizabeth, through her strong will and effort, succeeds in undoing the spell that has caused Meliodas and Diane to fight each other.

programme.title: The Seven Deadly Sins Ep7
programme.desc: Touching Reunion - Ban joins up with Meliodas and gang and they head towards the Capital of the Dead to find the next Sin, King.

programme.title: The Seven Deadly Sins Ep8
programme.desc: Dreadful Pursuer - King appears before Meliodas and the rest. However, King holds a very strong hatred for Ban and wants revenge.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad Of Ricky Bobby

programme.title: Jack Taylor: Shot Down
programme.desc: His assistant in gun related coma, guilt stricken private investigator Jack Taylor leaves Galway for Dublin where he helps a young girl whose mother has been murdered.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters S1 Ep7

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Malic acid gives Warheads candy its sour punch, vegetables are transformed into faux meat, we see the creation of maple bacon chocolate pods, and the large-scale production of sauerkraut.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Time and brine combine to produce the perfect pickle; see the creation of Fizzies drink tablets; plus maple cream chocolates and chocolate bliss balls.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Borneo: Sacred Forest - Borneo is the richest rainforest island of all; home to 40,000 species of plants and animals.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Morocco - Comedians Maisie Adam and Suzi Ruffell wouldn't call themselves road aficionados - it took 10 goes to pass their driving tests between them - but they're tackling Morocco anyway.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how the St Louis Rail Station went from being the biggest in the United States to falling into disrepair.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme Australia, South Australia and Victoria - Robson gets in with the locals to track down a beautiful fish known locally as 'reds', and tries his hand on a huge fishing trawler.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Koala Country - Despite being one of Australia’s best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Here Comes the Rain - Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore what’s it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Madagascar in Cold Blood - Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Connections - Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloo’s biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals we’ll meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Joined at the Hip - The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Fires of Don Goyo - Volcanic folklore is reflected in Mexican history. One of their ancient legends tells the story of the Aztec warrior Popocatépetl - a giant active volcano - who erupts to wake his sleeping princess Iztaccíhuatl, a neighbouring extinct ice capped volcano.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emerald Season - It’s the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep2
programme.desc: After the Rains - As the dry season takes hold in Zambia's Luangwa Valley, lagoons will start to dry-up and verdant grasslands will gradually turn to dust. Animals must make the most of the wet season’s legacy whilst they can.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Stacey and her gang - organiser Dilly, carpenter Rob and cleaner Iwan - challenge the Daniels family to sort their life out in seven days.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the final chapter for the remaining cooks as they present their book concept and a range of recipes to the crème de la crème. Who has the ultimate recipe for success?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Taste of Shanghai
programme.desc: Renowned chef Rick Stein searches for the source of the Chinese dishes known around the world.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep8

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the final chapter for the remaining cooks as they present their book concept and a range of recipes to the crème de la crème. Who has the ultimate recipe for success?

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie cooks three one-pan recipes that provide a perfect solution for busy life: a super-fast, flavour-packed smoky noodle soup; the cleverest homemade bread in a pan; and a chicken & mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Special Occasions - Rachel celebrates the indulgent side of chocolate. She creates a luxurious chocolate mousse with a twist, and adds a chocolatey take to a pasta dish, cacio e pepe.

programme.title: Nadiya's Party Feasts S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain shares her favourite party dishes. She joins a group of children as they make cupcakes, lends a hand with a trifle and helps out with a birthday cake.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Materials and Craftsmanship - Kevin and the experts look at a meticulously crafted barn conversion and a timber-framed, timber-clad eco home, before the winner of the RIBA House of the Year 2022 is announced.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep59
programme.desc: Cult Fiction - King Julien resumes his trek to reclaim his kingdom; Clover and Sage find aa self-help seminar led by an old friend; Mort finally contacts King Julien

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep60
programme.desc: Fauxsa Unchained - King Julien and Maurice infiltrate a Foosa gladiator school; Sage and Clover must face their enemies; Mort decides he must form his own army

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep8
programme.desc: Do-Over - Frustrated with life in the future, Cleo attempts to use Brian’s untested time machine to return to ancient Egypt. In the process, she ends up caught in an ever-shrinking time loop which may lead to the destruction of the entire universe.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos Ep1
programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Shrek the Halls Ep1
programme.desc: Shrek The Halls - Shrek's plans for a cozy family celebration spirals into one truly unforgettable Christmas.

programme.title: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-Tacular Ep1
programme.desc: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-Tacular - Deck the halls with Donkey's laughter in this all-new crazy and colorful collection of animated Christmas goodies and hilarious holiday surprises.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Hammy's Boomerang Adventure Ep1
programme.desc: Hammy's Boomerang Adventure - RJ the raccoon produces a nature video, which turns out to be an excuse for him and the porcupine children to play pranks on Hammy the squirrel

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers – to get them out of town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission…and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep27
programme.desc: Enemy Of My Enemy - After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagur's intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.
