programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep14
programme.desc: Team Astrid - After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers – to get them out of town.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep105
programme.desc: Flowertot Fairies - The twins are sure they have seen fairies in the garden and set out on a hunt to prove it to Fifi. Will they find any?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep106
programme.desc: Dandelions - The twins inadvertently ruin Fifi's garden while playing a game. Can they and the other tots make it better before Fifi finds out?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep107
programme.desc: Come And Play Slugsy - Stingo has dispatched Slugsy to steal Fifi's jelly. Slugsy starts to play with the twins and forgets what he set out to do, much to Stingo's wrath!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep108
programme.desc: Bumble's Magic - Bumble is practicing for his magic show… but he has made the twins disappear! Can Fifi help him find them before the big show?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Olivia Ep3
programme.desc: Olivia Trains Her Cat - When Olivia's class holds a pet talent show, nobody can beat Francine's amazingly talented cat Gwendolyn. Olivia's lethargic cat Edwin, who barely moves, suddenly goes missing. Olivia then fancies herself a cat detective as shetracks down the missing cat.

programme.title: Olivia Ep4
programme.desc: Olivia's Lemonade Stand - Olivia's lemonade stand is losing customers to Francine's pink lemonade stand. Olivia does her one better by opening up her own full-scale backyard restaurant, imagining it's a fabulous supper club. But Olivia soon finds that her restaurant needs something she can only get from Francine – something pink!

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jet–Olivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country –Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly… he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled… until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs… hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair… lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep63
programme.desc: Remember Me Not - An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep37
programme.desc: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever - Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Snow Mystery - It's Christmas Day and Noddy's got a new snowglobe. He wishes it would snow outside but Big Ears tells him that it has never snowed in Toyland. Noddy uses all his investigating skills to works out that by combining Smartysaurus glitter experiment with Deltoid's soccer ball and using Revs' lights, he can light up the DareDale caves with beautiful snowflake images just like the inside of his snowglove. If anyone can make it snow in Toyland, Noddy can! Hurrah!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Wonky Toys - All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep37
programme.desc: The Tooth Pirate / Zups - When Archibald loses his last baby tooth, he wants to hold onto it forever. But in a bizarre dream, the dastardly Tooth Pirate steals it and Archibald must set out on a high seas adventure to get it back. / Archibald and Sage go door-to-door selling specialty ketchups for a Rooster Ranger Fundraiser.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep37
programme.desc: Lucky and the Resolutionary Fever - Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep11
programme.desc: Elder Skelter / A More Perfect Reunion - Audrey is in for more than she expected after taking over the Elder position. Dot’s preschool reunion, pushes her to look more accomplished than her old rival.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep21
programme.desc: Rude-A-Snakening / Afteryard - After being stuck inside a snake, the Mighty Ones escape, but the yard that was their home has changed and is now a much more hostile environment. / The newly renovated yard is inhospitable, but the Mighty Ones find a paradise on the refreshment table at a garden party... until the guests arrive.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Builds Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek - Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Ninja Season! - Gil wants to be a ninja! But his ninja teacher just keeps giving him random tasks to do. Frustrated, Gil is about to give up, when another ninja challenges him, and he realizes he's been learning ninja skills all along!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Blue's Big Dance Party - Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Three is a Magic Number - With the help of El Guardián, the crew solves the puzzle of their new headquarters in order to unlock a secret treasure.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Legend of El Ratoncio Pérez - The crew must team up with the fabled tooth mouse El Ratoncito Perez to retrieve his stolen cap and satchel from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what!

programme.desc: Traditions - Robby backs out of Alex's traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.desc: Episod Semuanya Tentang Kita: Malaysia Madani (Khas) akan meninjau keadaan sampah-sarap yang dibuang manusia, pengutipan, pengurusan dan pelupusan yang terancang hasil kerjasama pihak-pihak yang berwajib. Perlukah sampah diasingkan sebelum dimasukkan ke dalam tong sampah? Selain melupuskan sampah ke dalam tong-tong sampah, patutkah penduduk memberikan perhatian kepada usaha mengitar semula atau mengkompos sampah makanan mereka? Saksikan dokumentari khas ini, hanya di BERNAMA TV.

programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News Ep57
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup - Tony Gustavsson - Interview Ep11
programme.desc: Tracey Holmes speaks with Matildas coach Tony Gustavsson about Australia's squad for the FIFA Women's World Cup and the pressure and opportunity as Australia co-hosts this major global sporting tournament.

programme.title: ABC News Ep57
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. At the top of the hour, coverage of the news that matters from the team you can trust.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and Tinirau Arona review the latest Pacific athletic achievements. Australian Gliders wheelchair basketball star Maryanne Latu shares her pride in representing Australia and her Tongan culture.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep27
programme.desc: Australia take a 2-1 Ashes lead into the Fourth Test at Old Trafford, the Matildas final match against France ahead of the FIFA Women's World Cup, plus State of Origin Game 3, Wimbledon, the latest AFL and the Wallabies.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 18 - West Coast Eagles v Richmond Ep106
programme.desc: Richmond are in a logjam of 12 teams chasing a top 8 finish. After 4 wins from their past 5 matches, the Tigers are one win behind 8th spot as they travel west to Perth to face the last placed West Coast Eagles in Round 18.

programme.title: Back Roads - Strzelecki Track, SA (Part 1) Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads returns with a journey on the Strzelecki Track, starting near Lyndhurst in SA and heading into the Strzelecki Desert. Heather Ewart witnesses a way of life on this historic track that's been unchanged for decades.

programme.title: Elements - Fire Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Yalanji People have been living in harmony with the land for over 50,000 years - developing a deep, intimate knowledge of their ecosystem and its lifecycles. They have also formed a close connection with fire.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.title: The China Century - Chinese Dreams Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chinese President Xi Jinping understands the greatest threat to the authoritarian state is not an invading army but the free minds of its people. This episode explores the fight for freedom of thought in China.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Coffs Harbour NSW: The Dormans Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - First-home buyers Emily and Jerome take on a move to the coastal destination of the Coffs Coast in NSW. Will they find the sea change to such a natural setting is too much of a departure from their Melbourne life?

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Dr Karl Kruszelnicki Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Dr Karl has shared his passion for life and science with Australians for decades. He reveals the fascinating life story that led him to broadcasting, as Anh tries to capture his natural curiosity and enthusiasm on canvas.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep57
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make shinoda rolls with taro stalks, a simple fall dish suitable for festive occasions.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: For close to 50 years, Miyazaki Manabu has been photographing wild animals entering human habitats using unmanned cameras he devised himself. He shares his thoughts on how we can coexist.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We visit Toyama to meet US-born Jack Lee Randall who performs shadow puppet plays for children, and Chinese-native Weng Fei who operates a concrete pump truck in Gifu.

programme.title: Amami: Biodiversity
programme.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Holm vs. Silva
programme.desc: Main Event - On a quest to regain the world bantamweight title, Holly Holm will attempt to pick up her second win of 2023 at the APEX in Las Vegas when she faces another hungry contender in Brazil’s Mayra Bueno Silva on July 15. On the best run of her UFC career, Bueno Silva has won three straight, with back-to-back submissions of Stephanie Egger and Lina Lansberg putting her on the verge of entering the title race. All that’s keeping her from that coveted spot is former world champion Holm, a superstar in MMA and boxing who is coming off a big win over Yana Santos in March

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC270NgannouvsGane
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2318
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races.
